  "description": "Cross Beverage Company Limited is a Nigerian startup producing a portfolio of affordable, daily consumed drink products.Our products positions us to meet both everyday hydration needs and the demand for flavored, wholesome beverage in the Nigerian market

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations and Production Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Cross Beverage Nigeria Limited is seeking a proactive and experienced Production and Operations Manager to lead the company&rsquo;s production and operational activities.
	The ideal candidate will ensure efficient plant performance, effective resource utilization, and full compliance with safety and regulatory standards. T
	his role requires strong leadership in managing production schedules, overseeing maintenance, monitoring quality control, and ensuring the smooth coordination of supply chain and logistics operations.
	Reporting directly to the Managing Director, you will play a key role in driving productivity, reducing operational costs, and achieving sustainable growth in line with the company&rsquo;s strategic objectives.


Responsibilities
Operations &amp; Production Management:


	Oversee daily factory operations and ensure consistent production output to meet demand targets.
	Plan and manage production schedules, monitor raw material usage, and ensure timely product delivery.
	Supervise the maintenance and performance of production machinery to minimize downtime.
	Implement quality control measures to maintain product standards in line with NAFDAC and SON regulations.
	Enforce hygiene, safety, and environmental compliance across all production units.
	Supervise and motivate factory staff, ensuring discipline, punctuality, and adherence to company policies.
	Identify production bottlenecks and implement solutions to enhance workflow and efficiency.
	Report quality results, incidents, or deviations to the Quality Supervisor or Factory Manager.


Planning, Resource &amp; Cost Management:


	Develop and execute monthly and quarterly production and operations plans aligned with business goals.
	Manage inventory levels and coordinate with procurement to ensure material availability.
	Control operational costs through effective resource utilization and waste reduction strategies.
	Forecast manpower, materials, and machinery requirements to meet production targets.
	Monitor and evaluate operational KPIs to measure efficiency, quality, and output.
	Provide data-driven recommendations for continuous process improvement.


Team Leadership &amp; Reporting:


	Lead, train, and mentor production and operations teams to improve productivity and accountability.
	Conduct regular performance reviews and identify staff training needs.
	Prepare and submit detailed production, operations, and cost analysis reports to management.


Requirement


	OND / HND / B.Sc. Degree in Engineering, Industrial Management, Industrial Chemistry, or related field.
	3 - 5 years of proven experience in production and operations management (preferably in beverage or FMCG
	Understanding of quality standards (e.g., NAFDAC regulations).
	Basic lab skills and ability to operate testing equipment.
	Good written and verbal communication skills.
	Attention to detail and strong observation skills.
	Willingness to work shifts, weekends, and in production environments.


Salary
N90,000 - N100,000 Monthly.&nbsp;

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their&nbsp;CV to:&nbsp;humanresources@crossbeverage.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

	Supervise and motivate factory staff, ensuring discipline, punctuality, and adherence to company policies.
	Identify production bottlenecks and implement solutions to enhance workflow and efficiency.
	Report quality results, incidents, or deviations to the Quality Supervisor or Factory Manager.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Chief Operating Officer (COO)",
  "description": "Barnksforte Group Limited is a diverse conglomerate which operations spans across different sectors of the economy; health, housing, energy, agriculture, and technology. The Company&rsquo;s core business focus is to develop state of the art technology that meets the needs of its Clients in Nigeria and Globally.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Chief Operating Officer (COO)

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)
Department: Information Security / Executive Management
Reports To: Group Managing Director / Chief Executive Officer
Supervises: Cybersecurity, IT Risk, Data Privacy, and Infrastructure Security Teams

Position Summary


	The Chief Operating Officer (COO) will be a key member of the executive leadership team, responsible for the effective management of Barnksforte Group&rsquo;s operational performance, strategic initiatives, and service delivery functions.
	The COO will ensure the alignment of technology deployment, project execution, and operational excellence with the company&rsquo;s overall strategic vision.
	This role requires a highly organized, execution-focused leader with deep experience in technology operations, digital infrastructure management, and large-scale program implementation, particularly in digital identity systems and enterprise platforms.


Key Responsibilities
Strategic Leadership and Business Execution:


	Collaborate with the CEO and Executive Team to translate corporate vision into actionable operational and technology strategies.
	Oversee daily operations, ensuring efficiency, productivity, and service excellence across all business units.
	Drive the execution of strategic initiatives in digital identity systems, infrastructure development, and technology innovation.
	Support the CEO in developing long-term growth strategies, business expansion plans, and performance improvement initiatives.


Operational Oversight:


	Lead and coordinate the activities of the Operations, Project Management and Service Delivery to ensure projects are completed on schedule, within scope, and within budget.
	Design and implement operational frameworks, policies, and SOPs that enhance cross-departmental efficiency.
